mapper.select: SELECT CL_ItemCode Prod_ItemCode, CL_MachineCode Prod_MachineCode, RIGHT(CL_MachineCode, 1) Right_Prod_MachineCode, SUM(CL_Qty) Prod_Qty, CONCAT("(",CL_ItemCode,") " , PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME) Prod_Desc, PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 Prod_Measure1, D.Child_TBL_Type Prod_Material, D1.Child_TBL_Type Prod_Type1, D2.Child_TBL_Type Prod_Type2 FROM Crate_Lot_tbl inner join Product_Info_tbl on CL_ItemCode = Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL D ON Product_Material = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D1 ON PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1 = D1.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D2 ON PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2 = D2.CHILD_TBL_NO inner JOIN Equip_WorkOrder_tbl eq ON eq.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = CL_MachineCode AND eq.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode = CL_ItemCode WHERE CL_Create_Date > CURDATE() GROUP BY CL_ItemCode, CL_MachineCode ORDER BY CL_MachineCode

SELECT Wrap_RemainQty, Wrap_MachineCode, Wrap_Qty, RIGHT(Mach2,1) Right_Wrap_MachineCode, CONCAT("(",CC.ItemCode,") " , p.Product_Item_Name) Wrap_Desc, p.Product_Info_STND_1 Wrap_Measure1, p.Product_Info_STND_2 Wrap_Measure2, D.Child_TBL_Type Wrap_Material, D1.Child_TBL_Type Wrap_Type1, D2.Child_TBL_Type Wrap_Type2 from (SELECT * from (SELECT Right(MachineCode,1) Mach2, ItemCode, sum(Qty) Wrap_Qty FROM Small_Packaging_tbl where Create_Date > CURDATE() group by MachineCode) AA LEFT outer Join (SELECT CL_MachineCode2 Wrap_MachineCode, right(CL_MachineCode2,1) Mach1, SUM(CL_ProductionQty) Wrap_RemainQty FROM Crate_Lot_tbl CL INNER JOIN Crate_tbl C ON C.C_CrateCode = CL.CL_CrateCode AND C.C_Production_LotNo = CL.CL_LotNo AND C.C_Condition = '3' WHERE CL_MachineCode2 is not NULL GROUP BY CL_MachineCode2) BB on BB.Mach1 = AA.Mach2) CC inner join Product_Info_tbl p on ItemCode = p.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL D ON p.Product_Material = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D1 ON p.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1 = D1.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D2 ON p.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2 = D2.CHILD_TBL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN Equip_WorkOrder_tbl eq ON eq.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = Wrap_MachineCode AND eq.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode = CC.ItemCode ORDER BY Mach2

SELECT CL_ItemCode Prod_ItemCode, CL_MachineCode Prod_MachineCode, RIGHT(CL_MachineCode, 1) Right_Prod_MachineCode, SUM(CL_Qty) Prod_Qty, CONCAT("(",CL_ItemCode,") " , PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME) Prod_Desc, PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 Prod_Measure1, D.Child_TBL_Type Prod_Material, D1.Child_TBL_Type Prod_Type1, D2.Child_TBL_Type Prod_Type2 FROM Crate_Lot_tbl inner join Product_Info_tbl on CL_ItemCode = Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL D ON Product_Material = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D1 ON PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1 = D1.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D2 ON PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2 = D2.CHILD_TBL_NO inner JOIN Equip_WorkOrder_tbl eq ON eq.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = CL_MachineCode AND eq.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode != CL_ItemCode WHERE CL_Create_Date > CURDATE() GROUP BY CL_ItemCode, CL_MachineCode ORDER BY CL_MachineCode LIMIT 3

SELECT Wrap_RemainQty, Wrap_MachineCode, Wrap_Qty, RIGHT(Wrap_MachineCode,1) Right_Wrap_MachineCode, CONCAT("(",CC.ItemCode,") " , p.Product_Item_Name) Wrap_Desc, p.Product_Info_STND_1 Wrap_Measure1, p.Product_Info_STND_2 Wrap_Measure2, D.Child_TBL_Type Wrap_Material, D1.Child_TBL_Type Wrap_Type1, D2.Child_TBL_Type Wrap_Type2 from (SELECT * from (SELECT Right(MachineCode,1) Mach2, ItemCode, sum(Qty) Wrap_Qty FROM Small_Packaging_tbl where Create_Date > CURDATE() group by MachineCode) AA Inner Join (SELECT CL_MachineCode2 Wrap_MachineCode, right(CL_MachineCode2,1) Mach1, SUM(CL_Qty) Wrap_RemainQty FROM Crate_Lot_tbl WHERE CL_Update_Date > CURDATE() and CL_MachineCode2 is not NULL GROUP BY CL_MachineCode2) BB on BB.Mach1 = AA.Mach2) CC inner join Product_Info_tbl p on ItemCode = p.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL D ON p.Product_Material = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D1 ON p.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1 = D1.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D2 ON p.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2 = D2.CHILD_TBL_NO inner JOIN Equip_WorkOrder_tbl eq ON eq.Equip_WorkOrder_Code = Wrap_MachineCode AND eq.Equip_WorkOrder_ItemCode != CC.ItemCode ORDER BY CC.Wrap_MachineCode LIMIT 3
